review.author: Frontend (Agent Teams)
review.findings: Opus review: Full integration trace â€” context-compressor.js pulls from 6 data sources, generates prioritized markdown snapshots within token budget, persists to workspace/context-snapshots/{paneId}.md. watcher.addWatch() for event-driven refresh (same pattern as shared-state.js). Cross-file contracts verified. Init/shutdown ordering correct. Found 2 bugs (shutdown leak + broken IPC listener), both fixed. 75 tests. Gemini cross-model: Approach sound, priority-based sectioning ensures core team status survives token pressure. Watcher + 120s timer combo provides high reliability. arch-hooks.js integration correctly prioritizes snapshots over intent fallbacks. 93 suites / 2996 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
